name: mini castle
description:
instructions: 

z to jump

arrow keys to move

I am testing the game engine tic80, it is a pretty fun engine to use. This was made very quickly but I made this page so people could see how it played.

It probably will never be made into a game, I am really lazy.

There isn't even a game yet.

I really need a tutorial on how to make signs that can be read with a button and changing maps, I haven't found anything on that so please if you find something give it to me in the comments and maybe I can make this into a game.

tic80: https://tic80.com/
